fester.translation[0].definitions[0].def: if an unpleasant feeling or problem festers, it gets worse because it has not been dealt with
fester.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: The dispute can be traced back to resentments which have festered for centuries.
fester.translation[0].definitions[1].def: if a wound festers, it becomes infected
fester.translation[0].definitions[2].def: if rubbish or dirty objects fester, they decay and smell bad
